channel.title: Making whole new items into Moparscape
channel.description: [size=13pt]Hello, Id like to know why they don't make brand new items into Moparscape. If u have the famous 'Skillcapes' into a server it would get alot more visitors. And then i mean REAL Skillcapes and not a normal cape with just an emote. Take a example: If u have your own Habbo server then u have just the normal stuff into your Hotel. If u also host your own DCR (maked with Sulake unprotector) U can make whole new stuff they never seen in a Hotel before. I read people making now their own Client for their Moparscape server. Isn't it possible to make new stuff then? Also the makers of Moparscape knows how they maked all other stuff into it. Why they dont give us 'Real Skillcapes' to .. Post ur suggestions here please, Thanks ;)[/size]

item.title: Making whole new items into Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @sanderfreak1 sanderfreak1
item.description:
@sanderfreak1 wrote:

I asked for suggestions about Skillcapes not my english…
u better learn because u said engilsh … I can’t help im not living in UK. or the USA

[br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2007, 12:19:15 PM[/size][hr]Now just lets stop talking about this and try to get more info about where this thread is made for.

Read full topic

[quote]Hello, Id like to know why they don’t make brand new items into Moparscape. If u have the famous ‘Skillcapes’ into a server it would get alot more visitors. And then i mean REAL Skillcapes and not a normal cape with just an emote. Take a example: If u have your own Habbo server then u have just the normal stuff into your Hotel. If u also host your own DCR (maked with Sulake unprotector) U can make whole new stuff they never seen in a Hotel before. I read people making now their own Client for their Moparscape server. Isn’t it possible to make new stuff then? Also the makers of Moparscape knows how they maked all other stuff into it. Why they dont give us ‘Real Skillcapes’ to …
Post ur suggestions here please, Thanks [/quote]
[size=10pt]Learn Some Engilsh next time you post![/size]
[/quote]

Well i got a suggestion for u
Dont spam in my thread now can a mod delete.[/quote]

This tells me and other members that you do not read the stickies. If you did you would know that he has a point because spelling and grammer is a rule. Before you post again, READ THE STICKIES.
